data.name: Black Otaku - SOS HD
data.detailed_description:
BLACK OTAKU - SOS HD COMING SOON TO STEAM

* end of summer/start of fall-ish
* after done being ported to the Unity Engine


About the Game

BLACK OTAKU - SOS IS NOW COMING TO STEAM

RUN-RIGHT AND SHOOT WILL NEVER DIE!!!
"Culture bought to you once again, ONLY from small business."


BLACK OTAKU - SOS coming soon to Steam after ported to the Unity Engine with the special Black History Month 4-ever price of $1.75-ish (because February is a short month).



"THESE GUYS ARE PIONEERING THE PLATFORM" - Isaiah "Triforce" Johnson
"THINGS I LOVED ABOUT THIS GAME …" - The Lab Video Game TV
"WOW, THAT LOOKS WICKED" - XboxOne-HQ
"DEFINITELY HAS POTENTIAL" - theZoneGamer

SAY WHAT?

Big guns have begun an attack on YOUR communities, and trust, bredren, YOU DI ONLY BLACK MAN DAT CYAN STOP DEM ...

and di only way to stop dem, is to run-right and shoot everything that moves!!!
* Parked cars don't move, but they explode so shoot those too!!!

Yes, bredren, YOU di only brotha that cyan protect YOUR communities from the big, muscled up Rigs ready to kick you in your face, silent shotgun wielding Shotties trying to put some holes in you, Nigerian Dambe Fighters repping their green, white and green, the TTA cru, Rhino Knifers, Akimbo Uzi machine rinsers and even more enemies ready to put you down!!!

Run-right and shoot your way through a campaign story of 7+ levels of RUN-N-GUN excitement. As the story unfolds through between level cutscenes, take a breather, bredren and prepare to run-right and shoot your way through the next level ... because RUN-RIGHT AND SHOOT WILL NEVER DIE!!!





FEATURES:
- 60fps at 1080p
- full-length game with 7+ levels
- save your game anywhere and at anytime
- twitch action, trigger finger shooter
- shoot in all 8 directions
- smooth parallax graphics scrolling

ACCOLADES:
- less than 1 month after release, hit the top 10, top paid, indie games in the Xbox One store
- less than 3 months after release on Xbox One, was featured on Jamaican cable TV presented by Isaiah "Triforce" Johnson
- debuted in the top 100 most popular, single player shooters in the Windows 10 store
- less than 1 month after release, hit the top 50 most popular, single player shooters in the Windows PC store
- OVER ONE YEAR LATER: still charting as the 47th top paid Xbox One indie game
- OVER ONE YEAR LATER: top 13th top paid, Xbox Live, single-player shooter on the Windows 10 PC store
- OVER ONE YEAR LATER: top 18th most popular, Xbox Live, single-player shooter on the Windows PC store
- AND NOW COMING SOON TO STEAM!!!



Now on Black History Month 4-ever sale at a special price of $1.75-ish because February is too short.
"CULTURE BROUGHT TO YOU PROPER ONLY FROM SMALL BUSINESS".

* game gifting also available for this game to buy a copy for any friends worth $1.75-ish!
* $1.75-ish CAD/USD dollars. Prices will vary depending on region and exchange rates.

THANK YOU FOR CHOOZING BLACK OTAKU - SOS!


RUN-RIGHT AND SHOOT WILL NEVER DIE!!!
"Culture bought to you once again, ONLY from small business."

Bless.

data.short_description: Big guns have begun an attack on YOUR communities, and trust, bredren, YOU DI ONLY BLACK MAN DAT CYAN STOP DEM ...and di only way to stop dem, is to run-right and shoot everything that moves!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 1.9 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 520
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.75 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 735 or higher
